name: Pudji
detailed_description:
Pudji is a Metroidvania 2D action rpg where you play as Pudji, the slightly overweight but self assured Ninja. Do you have what it takes?

Level up, gain skill levels as a thief, ranger, warrior, knight, mage, monk, gambler, scout, and tradesmen. Combine skill lines to commit further to your archetype (ex: Stalker = Thief + Ranger), once your skills have reached level 40.

Collect weapon and spell recipes of random rarity and power than can be crafted using tiers of wood, stone, ore, and crystals, along with rare enemy materials, Upgrade weapon/spell levels, and reforge them into tier 2 and 3.

Combine weapon types to maximize skill gains, get creative. Some dual wield daggers, others use two handed swords or bows, but real men fight with only their fists. Cast spells and shoot a hand crossbow, or perhaps a sword and shield is more your thing?
